Class StraightFlush

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardList
      • Hand
        • StraightFlush
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StraightFlush
extends Hand
    The class models a hand of StraightFlush in Big Two game. Subclass of Hand.
    Author:
    Hu Qiyun
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      boolean beats(Hand hand)
      This method checks if this StraightFlush Hand beats a specified Hand.
      Card getTopCard()
      Retrieve the card on the top of this StraightFlush Hand, the card with the highest rank in a straight flush is referred to as the top card of this straight flush.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Get the type of this StraigtFlush Hand.
      boolean isValid()
      Check the StraightFlush hand is valid or not.

      • beats

        public boolean beats(Hand hand)
        This method checks if this StraightFlush Hand beats a specified Hand.
        Overrides:
        beats in class Hand
        Parameters:
        hand - The other Hand to be compared.
        Returns:

        See Also:

      • getTopCard

        public Card getTopCard()
        Retrieve the card on the top of this StraightFlush Hand, the card with the highest rank in a straight flush is referred to as the top card of this straight flush.
        Overrides:
        getTopCard in class Hand
        Returns:
        Return the top card of this Hand.
